name: Auburn National Bancorp, Inc.
description: Auburn National Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company headquartered in Auburn, Alabama. Established in 1996, the company operates AuburnBank, which provides a wide array of financial services to individuals and businesses in the local community. AuburnBank focuses on personalized customer service and community involvement, offering products such as personal checking and savings accounts, commercial loans, mortgage loans, and investment services. The bank prides itself on its commitment to the communities it serves, supporting local events and initiatives through various philanthropic efforts. With a focus on innovation, Auburn National Bancorp is also enhancing its digital banking capabilities to ensure customers have access to modern banking solutions. The company's strategy is centered around sustainable growth and maintaining a strong balance sheet, with an emphasis on building lasting relationships with its customers. As a community bank, Auburn National Bancorp aims to promote economic development in the regions it serves while providing a safe and secure banking environment.

seo.meta_title: Auburn National Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Auburn National Bancorp, Inc., a community bank dedicated to providing personalized banking services and supporting local development. Explore our products and commitment to customer service.

faq.question: What services does AuburnBank offer?
faq.answer: AuburnBank offers personal banking, commercial banking, and investment services to its customers.

faq.question: Where is Auburn National Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Auburn National Bancorp is headquartered in Auburn, Alabama, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Auburn National Bancorp?
faq.answer: H. Charles G. Williams is the CEO of Auburn National Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: When was Auburn National Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Auburn National Bancorp was founded in 1996.
